languages.text: {n}По глазам видно — он знает, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}кто вы{/d}. И он опасается вас... но голос его все еще дерзок.{/n} "Я знаю, кто ты. Но ты пока не знаешь, кто я".

{n}You can see it in his eyes: he does know {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}you{/d}. He is nervous... but his voice remains as bold as before:{/n} "I know who you are. But you know nothing of me yet."
languages.original_text: {n}По глазам видно — он знает, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}кто вы{/d}. И он опасается вас... но голос его все еще дерзок.{/n} "Я знаю, кто ты. Но ты пока не знаешь, кто я".

languages.text: {n}Du siehst es in den Augen: Er kennt {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}dich{/d}. Er ist nervös ... aber seine Stimme bleibt fest:{/n} "Ich weiß, wer Ihr seid. Aber Ihr wisst noch nichts über mich."
languages.original_text: {n}You can see it in his eyes: he does know {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}you{/d}. He is nervous... but his voice remains as bold as before:{/n} "I know who you are. But you know nothing of me yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du siehst es in den Augen: Er kennt {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}dich{/d}. Er ist nervös ... aber seine Stimme bleibt fest:{/n} "Ich weiß, wer Ihr seid. Aber Ihr wisst noch nichts über mich."

languages.text: {n}Il sait qui {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}vous{/d} êtes. Vous le lisez dans ses yeux. Malgré sa nervosité, il s'exprime d'une voix forte et pleine d'audace :{/n} « Je sais qui vous êtes. Mais vous, vous ne savez rien de moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}You can see it in his eyes: he does know {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}you{/d}. He is nervous... but his voice remains as bold as before:{/n} "I know who you are. But you know nothing of me yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il sait qui {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}vous{/d} êtes. Vous le lisez dans ses yeux. Malgré sa nervosité, il s'exprime d'une voix forte et pleine d'audace :{/n} « Je sais qui vous êtes. Mais vous, vous ne savez rien de moi. »

languages.text: {n}Se le nota en los ojos. Sí, sabe {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}quién{/d} eres. Está nervioso... pero su voz es tan atrevida como antes:{/n} «Sé quién eres. Pero tú no sabes nada sobre mí».
languages.original_text: {n}You can see it in his eyes: he does know {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}you{/d}. He is nervous... but his voice remains as bold as before:{/n} "I know who you are. But you know nothing of me yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se le nota en los ojos. Sí, sabe {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}quién{/d} eres. Está nervioso... pero su voz es tan atrevida como antes:{/n} «Sé quién eres. Pero tú no sabes nada sobre mí».

languages.text: {n}男の目を見ればわかる。男は{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}あなた{/d}が誰かを知っていた。彼はナーバスになっている…だが、その声は以前と変わらず力強いままだ。{/n}「お前が誰かは知っている。だが、お前は俺のことをまだ何も知らない」
languages.original_text: {n}You can see it in his eyes: he does know {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}you{/d}. He is nervous... but his voice remains as bold as before:{/n} "I know who you are. But you know nothing of me yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}男の目を見ればわかる。男は{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}あなた{/d}が誰かを知っていた。彼はナーバスになっている…だが、その声は以前と変わらず力強いままだ。{/n}「お前が誰かは知っている。だが、お前は俺のことをまだ何も知らない」

languages.text: {n}从他的视线中你可以看出，他确实知道{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}你{/d}是谁。他很紧张……但他的声音依然中气十足。{/n}“我知道你是谁，但你还不知道我是谁呢。”
languages.original_text: {n}You can see it in his eyes: he does know {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}you{/d}. He is nervous... but his voice remains as bold as before:{/n} "I know who you are. But you know nothing of me yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}从他的视线中你可以看出，他确实知道{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}你{/d}是谁。他很紧张……但他的声音依然中气十足。{/n}“我知道你是谁，但你还不知道我是谁呢。”

languages.text: {n}Bakışlarından {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}seni{/d} tanıdığını okuyabiliyorsun. Gergin olsa da... Ses tonu, cesaretinden hiçbir şey kaybetmiyor.{/n} "Kim olduğunu biliyorum. Ancak sen, henüz benim hakkımda hiçbir şey bilmiyorsun."
languages.original_text: {n}You can see it in his eyes: he does know {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_GreatDeed}you{/d}. He is nervous... but his voice remains as bold as before:{/n} "I know who you are. But you know nothing of me yet."
